Yeah. English is probably the least consistent language out there.[/bq]

Actually, the most toughest language are the Chinese and Arabian.
English is considered one of the most easiest. Actually, learning english is more easy than learning spanish.

Japanese people learn english too fast because the English language is an amalgamation of various native tongues, including Latin.

Actually with Homonyms like Too,two, and to. And with words like Mom(has a special name in English which I forgot). And there is even long paragraphs that confuse the living snot out of people.

TLDR:English is a hard language to learn.
